Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory176.png'}
{3: 'The cleaning is actually very easy. After the last ball disappears, the walls no longer deteriorate, and the pagoda tree has stopped withering.'}
{3: 'In fact—'}
{3: 'The walls now shine like mirrors, giving a reflection of sunlight that is harsh on the eyes.'}
{2: 'Even the texture has changed...', 3: '9', 4: 'Too much rendering!', 5: '9'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, no danger ahead.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The buildings on both the left and right are locked. Only the one in front can be opened.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I have checked inside and found no threat.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But there wasn't any hint either.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Maybe it needs all of us to be present?', 3: '17', 4: 'Shall we check somewhere else?', 5: '18'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I have also considered that possibility.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But Tiger just wouldn't leave the room.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Based on previous experience, that room should be our next stop.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory423.jpg'}
{3: 'The building has four rooms, all fully furnished. A line of arcade machines sit in the living room. Tiger is sitting on them, taking a nap.'}
{3: 'There are a few apples in the basket on the coffee table. The apples seem to be freshly washed as there are still water drops on them.'}
{3: 'Based on past experience, if this is the right place, some hint would suddenly show up.'}
{3: 'For example, a notice board that protrudes from the ground, a voice that appears in our mind, or even an NPC with a yellow exclamation mark on top...'}
{3: 'But none of them has happened. After everyone has entered the building, Tiger has not scanned anything but remained on the arcade, unwilling to get up.'}
{3: 'Severe stomach cramps hit you as you struggle to find any clue. You feel like all your internal organs have been emptied from the abdomen, or replaced with ice.'}
{3: 'It is a very familiar feeling that sometimes would take place during long-term combat missions.'}
{3: '"Grumble—"'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Hmm? Commandant, are you hungry?', 4: '1'}
{2: "It is Nanami's interference.", 3: '35'}
{3: 'You contributed a lot in the "dust and clean" operation, but the energy consumed should not have caused this situation.'}
{3: '"Grumble—"'}
{3: 'You hear another extended grumble, but not from your body.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'What? Lucia too...?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Unlike your exaggerated response, Lucia just rests her hand on her abdomen. She looks confused.'}
